column1: Xiguit District or Shiguai District (Mongolian: ᠰᠢᠭᠤᠶᠢᠲᠤ ᠲᠣᠭᠣᠷᠢᠭ Siɣuyitu toɣoriɣ
column2: Шигуай тойрог; simplified Chinese: 石拐区; traditional Chinese: 石拐區; pinyin: Shíguǎi Qū) is an outlying district of Baotou
column3: the largest city of Inner Mongolia

column1: The district is home to Badekar Monastery and the national park that surrounds it.
